byline.original: By DANIEL E. SLOTNIK and DAVID MONTGOMERY

abstract: Officials attribute at least eight deaths in Dallas area to series of 11 tornadoes that swept through North Texas as storm system rampaged through South.
lead_paragraph: The death toll from storms that have rampaged through the South rose to more than 20 people on Saturday, with the latest fatalities reported in the Dallas area.

headline.main: Eight Dead as Tornadoes Strike the Dallas Area
headline.print_headline: At Least 8 Are Killed in Dallas Area as Several Tornadoes Sweep Through Region

snippet: The death toll from storms that have rampaged through the South rose to more than 20 people on Saturday, with the latest fatalities reported in the Dallas area.
